name: Space Particle Mess
description:
This is not an special thing but I wanted to share this game with you guys if you like it.

Space = Boost (spaaam spam spam)

A = Left tilt

D = Right tilt

Minimum GPU requirements:  Nvidia Quadro k6000

Recommended GPU requirements: GT 1030

Minimum CPU requirements: 1st gen Intel core i3-540

Recommended CPU requirements:9th gen Intel core i5-9400F

Minimum Ram: 4GB s +

Recommended Ram: 8GBs +
